entry.title: Tuesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow. Low minus 15.
